/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libpango_scene.so.0 -o libpango_scene.so.0.9.2 CMakeFiles/pango_scene.dir/components/pango_scene/src/renderable.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/cai/Dev/rc_smart_cart/orb-slam3-setup/pangolin/build: libpango_opengl.so.0.9.2 libpango_image.so.0.9.2 libpango_core.so.0.9.2 -lrt -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libEGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libepoxy.so
